PROFILE.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE.SUBTITLE: A few words about me
PROFILE.DESCRIPTION: I am a technology enthusiast and digital thinker with a passion for innovation, gaming, sci-fi, and Japanese culture. Throughout my professional career, I have specialized in quality assurance, technical documentation, and customer support, and now I would like to immerse myself more in the IT field.The world of computer science fascinates me, which is why I am furthering my education in business informatics.I love finding creative solutions and overcoming technical challenges.
